New Records: DeMar DeRozan scored 30 points on 12-of-26 shooting
Key Match Events: DeRozan took over after the first overtime with a 3-pointer and a trio of step-back jumpers that stunned Miami
Jaquez missed a pair of free throws with 3 seconds left in the first overtime
Tyler Herro was called for a costly 8-second violation toward the end of the fourth quarter
Pre-Game Insights: Kings are playing with a lot more heart and effort under interim coach Doug Christie than they did the final two weeks under former coach Mike Brown
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Erik Spoelstra's team played solid for the first four quarters but got sloppy in overtime
Kings extend their winning streak to a season-high five games under interim coach Doug Christie
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaime Jaquez Jr. had a triple-double with 16 points, 12 rebounds and 10 assists for Miami
Heat are 4-7 without Jimmy Butler this season
Others: The game was tied at 102 at the end of regulation and at 112 after the first overtime
